attributes.action: Increase the expansion of Stansted Airport beyond 25 million passengers per annum.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Allow further expansion of Stansted Airport beyond the current maximum limit of 25 million passenger per annum by ensuring that both:

a) Further expansion by greater use of the existing single runway to a level greater than 25mppa is allowed.

b) The construction of a proposed second runway is permitted.

This will increase jobs, business, and prosperity to the local economy. Allow the working class holidays abroad as well as increasing tourism within the UK.

Stopping Stansted Airport expansion alone will not stop climate change. There are hundreds of others ways to offset carbon emissions.
